creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: figure with white face and outstretched arms at center holding decorated fan in PR hand; figure wears purple robe decorated with blue, yellow, gold, green, and red flowers; highly detailed orange skirt underneath; detailed white garment under top of robe, ornate golden headdress
markings: LRC, square relief: 吉隆之印
medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
title: Noh Scene: Hagoromo
